description: This PHP source file generates the web-based status page for network connections, including local IP addresses, IPv6 info, Wi-Fi configurations, MoCA status, and connection to external networks. It combines PHP logic with embedded HTML, JavaScript, and CSS to display various network parameters and statuses.

methods.name: php_KeyExtGet
methods.description: A wrapper function to conditionally modify parameters based on session mode, primarily to disable certain features when in 'psmMode'.
